extendedInfo.description: âââ Featured on Fox News, PC Magazine, The Next Web, Lifehacker, and more ââââ Declared by PC Magazine as one of the Best Fitness Appsâ "With Fitsby, you can think about the money your friends will wave in your face if you skip out on your workout." -Lifehackerâ "If youâre finding it particularly hard to get to the gym this holiday season, Fitsby may be the app for you." -Tech Cocktail----------------Reach your workout goal and win money from your friends who didn't reach theirs! Fitsby is a fun way to stay motivated to hit the gym. Challenge your friends to a game of gym check-ins and win by reaching your gym goal. When the game ends, the gym goers who reached their goals will be rewarded money from their friends who didn't meet their gym goals. Read our FAQ at http://fitsby.com/faq.html to learn more.----------------â HOW IT WORKS:1. Join a game and invite your friends to play.2. Work out and check in at the gym (Fitsby uses your smartphone's GPS to verify that you are at a gym and also requires that you work out a minimum of 30 minutes before you can successfully check out).3. When the game ends, the players who met their gym goals are rewarded money from those who didn't meet theirs.----------------â KIIP REWARDS:Regardless of whether or not you win a game, you can earn awesome free rewards just for your workout! Examples are $1 Amazon.com MP3 credits, American Apparel discount coupons, and free glasses from Coastal.com. There's no extra effort on your part -- just keep using Fitsby to check in at your gym, and get rewarded for working out!----------------â SO WHY USE FITSBY? HERE ARE THE STATISTICS:- 67% of people who hold gym memberships never use them.- The average number of times a person with a gym membership will go to the gym is 2.- A recent MIT study has shown that people in online health communities are 166% more likely to change behavior when they receive reinforcement from multiple neighbors in their social network.- In a study by UPenn professor, Dr. Kevin Volpp, use of economic incentives produced significant weight loss. People who were offered money had a 5 times higher chance of being more likely to lose weight than those who were given no incentives.----------------â¢ Make sure to connect to Wi-Fi for most accurate location data.â¢ Questions? Read our FAQ at http://fitsby.com/faq.html.â¢ Problems/Feedback? Email us at team@fitsby.com and we'll get back to you right away.

reviews.title: Good app but checking problems
reviews.comment: This seems like a great app. Really like the design and concept. Unfortunately I live in a major city area and likr all apps that require check in, GPS can be tricky in the city. So unfortunately I cant check into my gym to use the app. Its a real shame too cause I like the app. Is there any chance of adding a manual check in?
reviews.author: leo selvaggio

reviews.title: cant register
reviews.comment: gives: java.lang.NullPointerException  so i dont eve get to try the app, disappointing!
reviews.author: Nuno Elias

reviews.title: Much better
reviews.comment: Now this app no longer rewards overtraining. The developers are always working on making this app better. I was lifting and one of them asked me what would make the app better and immediately called another developer about it. They sure aren\'t lazy!
reviews.author: Justin Kang

reviews.title: Wonderful Idea
reviews.comment: The app works exactly the way it is suppose to. UI is simple and understandable. Moreover a great idea for gym motivation. There were some small bugs but I guess the developers are constantly working on its improvement. Great work.
reviews.author: Snehal Pachigar

reviews.title: Location error. **fixed**
reviews.comment: Firat use I did my workout and when I went to checkout it said I wasn\'t  in the same place as when  started the workout. Since then the error has been fixed and it seems to work great
reviews.author: Derek English

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Awesome app! Love challenging my buddies. Great idea
reviews.author: Kendall Bond

reviews.title: has potential
reviews.comment: I like the idea behind this but this will likely lead to people over-training and going to the gym more often then they should. Also kind of builds off GymPact\'s idea which is designed better as you set the number of days you will go to the gym and then if you miss that # of days your money goes into a huge pot that is split by everyone that went to the gym their set number of days.
reviews.author: Dirk Davidson

reviews.title: Cant even create an account
reviews.comment: Please fix null pointer exception error.
reviews.author: Varun Shah

reviews.title: Cannot register
reviews.comment: Gives me some Java null error. Does not allow me to register. Using another app for the same purpose now.
reviews.author: Deepesh Bhagwanani

reviews.title: Great work
reviews.comment: Loving all the features and fixes added in the updates
reviews.author: Brent Hronik
